description: projectM transforms audio input into psychedelic visuals that can be used as a desktop wallpaper, screensaver, or video. It is available as a standalone program or as a plug-in for other audio programs.

To transform audio input into visualizations, projectM uses a variety of audio- and visual-related settings. These settings are specified in PRJM files. Different PRJM files specify different values for each of projectM's settings, producing unique visuals from the same piece of audio content.
NOTE: projectM can also use MilkDrop's MILK files as presets.
